item.title: Dancing GIF - Find & Share on GIPHY
Facebook's new cameras capture a virtual reality you can move around in
item.description:
Facebook's new cameras capture a virtual reality you can move around in

Virtual reality has an image problem. While plenty of cameras out there capture spherical footage of real-life scenes that you can then look at in VR (see "10 Breakthrough Technologies 2017: The 360-Degree Selfie"), most of them don't also capture depth data.

item.title: Apple is taking augmented reality very seriously
item.description:
Apple is taking augmented reality very seriously

Apple is reportedly planning to bring augmented reality to the masses. According to Bloomberg , Apple's CEO, Tim Cook, plans for the company to add AR features to the iPhone and, later, launch a pair of smart glasses that allow users to augment their reality.

item.title: Google is convinced that live-action VR is the way to consumers' hearts and heads
item.description:
Google is convinced that live-action VR is the way to consumers' hearts and heads

Google, convinced that live-action films and experiences are the way to get people interested in using virtual reality, is pushing out a new high-end camera system called Halo that it hopes will inspire filmmakers to create more things to watch.

item.title: Watch Bjork's Vivid Virtual Reality 'Notget' Video
item.description:
Watch Bjork's Vivid Virtual Reality 'Notget' Video

Björk's animated avatar dances within a vibrant ocean in her virtual reality "Notget" video, directed by Warren Du Perez and Nick Thornton Jones. The brooding, orchestral epic is the latest track from her 2015 LP, , to receive the VR treatment, following "Black Lake," "Stonemilker" and a trailer for her "Family" clip.

item.title: Samsung Gear Finally Gets a Controller for Awesomer VR
item.description:
,,

Samsung Gear Finally Gets a Controller for Awesomer VR

Until phone-based VR supports the ability to move in virtual environments, an Oculus Rift or HTC Vive gives you a whole lot more of the matrix to explore. But the addition of motion controllers and the ability to manipulate digital objects have the Samsung Gear VR and Google Daydream View narrowing the gap a bit.
